overview: The ever-unresistable Brad Fitt takes the lead in this modern-day fable of love and loss, set in Slovakia against the backdrop of the Velvet Revolution and its aftermath. Too highbrow for gay porn? Don’t worry, the inimitable talents of Justin Conway, Kris Wallace and a whole host of other cute, horny lads ensures that this is one chapter in history you’ll want to replay over and over again. Big cocks, hungry asses and an almost unbelievable volume of spunk – not to mention the director’s eye for the downright sordid! – make this exactly the kind of ranch we’d all love to bed down in given half the chance.
title: Open Range
